articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
Halloween hooligans, a potent potable, and a Market Basket brawl all factor into this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Halloween celebrations in Salem attract large crowds, impacting local businesses and traffic.
Sam Adams beer promotion highlights local breweries, boosting sales in Greater Boston.
Market Basket brawl on October 31 raises concerns about safety in grocery stores.

articles.title: Ask the remodeler: Let there be light in your home as Daylight Saving ends
articles.description:
From understanding ambient versus task lighting to creative ways of letting in natural light, here’s a guide to brightening your home.

The post Ask the remodeler: Let there be light in your home as Daylight Saving ends appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore ways to enhance home lighting as Daylight Saving ends on November 5, 2023.
Learn about ambient versus task lighting for improved home functionality and aesthetics.
Implementing these tips can increase natural light, benefiting Boston residents' well-being.
